SEARCH
Package RaccoonRush.map

Class MapManager

java.lang.Object
RaccoonRush.map.MapManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameManager
public class MapManager extends Object implements GameManager
MapManager class is used to manage the map of the game. It is used to load the map, draw the map, and handle collisions.

  • Method Details

    • getScreenCoordinate

      public int getScreenCoordinate(int index, int world, int screen)
      Method to get the screen coordinate of a tile This allows the map to be drawn relative to the player's screen, emulating camera movement
      Parameters:
      index - index of the tile
      world - world coordinate
      screen - screen coordinate
      Returns:
      screen coordinate

    • getStart

      private int getStart(int world, int screen)
      Method to get the drawing start index of the map This means that the tiles are only drawn if they are within the screen
      Parameters:
      world - world coordinate
      screen - screen coordinate
      Returns:
      start index

    • getEnd

      private int getEnd(int world, int screen, int max)
      Method to get the drawing end index of the map This means that the tiles are only drawn if they are within the screen
      Parameters:

      screen - screen coordinate
      max - maximum index
      Returns:
      end index
